content: up to you how many row you work before and after the thumb hole depending on your hands or the hands you are making for the pattern here fits a small to average women s hand size with average to long finger length *pattern can be adapted to children and men or larger hands you will add or minus row from the wrist band *as seen in my igtv tutorial it is completely fine to have an odd number of stitches around and work one lone half_double_crochet at the end of each row before you join
